IMPORTANT UPDATE!

Based on input from our many dedicated users, we have made an update that lifts your ooono to a whole new level. Through the app, you will get a wireless update of the firmware in your ooono. This means less battery consumption and faster connection to everyone. In addition, we have improved the functionality and corrected several minor errors.
• Wireless firmware update
• Improved battery consumption
• Faster connection

If you experience any problems associated with the firmware update of ooono, please contact our customer service team.

Sincerely,
ooono

Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Hotfix for data sync. problem
Hotfix for data sync. problem

In this update, we are addressing issues relating to missing or false warnings. Specifically this update fixes:
- Missing road hazards warnings
- Missing warnings about certain speedcam types
- Faster update of warnings
We also added support for 90 sec. warning distance in the settings view
+ a number of smaller performance and stability updates.

In this update, we are addressing issues relating to missing or false warnings. Specifically this update fixes:
- Missing road hazards warnings
- Missing warnings about certain speedcam types
- Faster update of warnings
We also added support for 90 sec. warning distance in the settings view
+ a number of smaller performance and stability updates.

- Fixed error in warning distance to the so-called "Red Light" cameras in Germany, so it is now fixed at 250 m.
- Improvements in the onboarding flow so that you can choose the types of warning you want from the start
- Added optional setting of warning distance as distance (meter) or time (sec)

- Fixed error in warning distance to the so-called "Red Light" cameras in Germany, so it is now fixed at 250 m.
- Improvements in the onboarding flow so that you can choose the types of warning you want from the start
- Added optional setting of warning distance as distance (meter) or time (sec)

We are happy to let you know, that ooono warnings can now be played via your phone and through the speakers in your car!
You will never ever miss an ooono warning again.
Find the feature under settings.

Safe travels.

You are now able to see your ooono batteri level in the connect app!

This update also includes general improvements and bugfixes:
Reports are instantly shown in the maps section
Power saving optimizations
Connection improvents

Please reach out at support@ooono.co.uk, if you experience problems.
